special.name: Fire Ring
special.description: Shoots a fire ring of some sort at the enemy to set them on fire for 5 seconds. Does 1000 damage and everytime the character gets hurt by another thing the fire will lite up again for another 5 seconds.2nd to last boss.
special.effect: Shoots fire ring out of ring. Does 1000 damage.every time the character gets hit by something they will start to catch on fire for 5 seconds.
